dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile represents the district boundaries in Uganda for 2006. These are the level 5 administrative (ADM5) boundaries. These data are intended for researchers, students, policy makers and the general public for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production. Uganda Bureau of Statistics. (2012). District Boundaries: Uganda, 2010. Uganda Bureau of Statistics. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/vg894mz3698 This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.
